original: 山陽高平人，西晉官員。曾為罪徒，被扶風王司馬駿以五百匹布贖之，既而用為從事中郎。當時以為美事。之後又因通經史、善文章，被辟為太子中庶子，為太子講解經籍。
text: Shanyang Gaoping, an official of the Western Jin Dynasty. Once a criminal, he was redeemed by Fufeng King Sima Jun with 500 pieces of cloth, and then used it as a middleman. I thought it was a good thing. Later, because of his general history and good essays, he was turned into the prince's middle concubine, explaining the scriptures for the prince.
